entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SW 40 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to plus 2 this morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High zero.
